title: User sign-up with valid email and password
description: Verify that new users can sign up using a valid email and password, and receive a confirmation of successful registration.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Input valid email and password
Submit the registration form
Confirm user is registered and redirected to onboarding or dashboard

title: User sign-up with invalid email format
description: Ensure the system rejects sign-up attempts with invalid email formats and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Input invalid email format and valid password
Submit the registration form
Check that error message for invalid email format is shown and registration is not allowed

title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify existing users can log in with correct email and password and receive access to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click on login button
User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard page

title: User login with incorrect password
description: Verify system prevents login when the password is incorrect and displays an error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and incorrect password
Click on login button
Login is rejected and appropriate error message is shown

title: Session persistence after login
description: Check that user session remains active after page refresh and navigation, providing a seamless experience.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Refresh the browser or navigate to a new page
User remains logged in and session is maintained

title: User profile editing and saving changes
description: Verify users can update profile information (name, email, global AI instructions) and changes are saved correctly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile page
Edit profile fields including name, email, and global AI instructions
Save the changes
Profile updates are persisted and reflected on reload

title: Subscription status enforcement for feature access
description: Validate that subscription status is checked in real-time and restricts access to paid features for non-subscribed users.

steps.description: Log in as a user with an expired or trial subscription
Attempt to access paid features like document creation or AI assistant
User is prevented from using paid features and prompted to upgrade subscription

title: Subscription trial checkout flow
description: Test the complete trial subscription checkout process via Polar integration and verify trial subscription is activated.

steps.description: Visit sign-up and initiate trial flow
Complete checkout using Polar's trial subscription
Trial subscription is activated and user can access subscription-restricted features

title: Document creation from dashboard
description: Validate that users can create new documents from the dashboard and the new document opens in the editor.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to document dashboard
Click create new document button
New blank document is created and editor page is displayed

title: Inline document title editing with persistence
description: Ensure that document titles can be edited inline on the dashboard and changes persist after reload.

steps.description: Open document dashboard
Edit document title inline
Save and refresh dashboard
Edited title is displayed and saved correctly

title: Document deletion from dashboard
description: Verify that users can delete documents from the dashboard and the document list updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to document dashboard
Select a document and choose delete option
Document is removed from dashboard and no longer accessible

title: Rich text formatting features in editor
description: Test all rich text formatting options including bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, headings H1-H3, lists, blockquotes, and paragraph formatting.

steps.description: Open an existing document in the editor
Apply each formatting option to sample text using toolbar and keyboard shortcuts
Formatted text appears correctly in editor with expected styles

title: Auto-save completes within 500ms and updates save status indicator
description: Verify that document changes trigger auto-save which completes within 500ms and the save status indicator updates accordingly.

steps.description: Open document editor and make content changes
Auto-save executes within 500ms of last change
Save status indicator changes from 'Saving...' to 'Saved' after auto-save

title: Manual save shortcut functionality
description: Ensure that users can manually trigger save using provided shortcuts and the save status indicator reflects saving state.

steps.description: Open a document and make changes
Use manual save keyboard shortcut
Document is saved and status indicator shows success

title: Unsaved changes warning on navigation
description: Test that users receive a warning about unsaved changes when trying to navigate away from the editor without saving.

steps.description: Edit document content without triggering auto-save or manual save
Attempt to navigate away from editor page
Warning prompt appears indicating unsaved changes

title: Knowledge base add, view, and delete knowledge items
description: Verify that users can add new knowledge entries, view the list of knowledge items, and delete entries without errors.

steps.description: Open the knowledge base sidebar in editor
Add a new knowledge item with title and content
New knowledge item appears in list
Select and delete a knowledge item
Deleted knowledge item is removed from the list

title: Knowledge base items included in AI writing context
description: Ensure that added knowledge base entries are correctly included as context for AI writing assistant responses.

steps.description: Add knowledge items in knowledge base
Open AI chat assistant and submit a relevant query
AI responses incorporate information from knowledge base entries

title: AI chat assistant response time and accuracy
description: Verify AI chat assistant responds within 5-10 seconds with relevant answers based on document content, knowledge base, chat history, and AI instructions.

steps.description: Open AI chat panel in editor
Send a context-rich query
AI responds within 10 seconds with contextually relevant and coherent information

title: AI chat insertion and copying of responses
description: Verify users can insert AI-generated responses into the document or copy the text to clipboard successfully.

steps.description: Generate AI response in chat assistant
Use options to insert AI text into document editor and copy to clipboard
Inserted text appears in editor and copied text matches response

title: Global and document-specific AI instructions management
description: Validate creation, editing, saving, and application of global and document-specific AI instructions to customize AI writing style.

steps.description: Navigate to profile page and edit global AI instructions
Open document and apply document-specific AI instructions
AI assistant behavior reflects the custom instructions provided

title: Document export to DOCX format preserves formatting
description: Test exporting document to DOCX format preserves all rich text formatting including styles, headings, lists, and blockquotes accurately.

steps.description: Open a document with diverse formatting
Export document as DOCX
Downloaded DOCX file opens correctly with all formatting preserved

title: Document export to PDF preserves formatting and multi-page layout
description: Verify exporting documents to PDF maintains the styles, headings, and layouts across multiple pages as in the editor.

steps.description: Open a multi-page formatted document
Export document as PDF
Generated PDF preserves content layout and formatting across all pages

title: Responsive UI behavior across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
description: Ensure the application UI with three-panel layout adjusts correctly and maintains usability on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open application on desktop, resize window to tablet and mobile dimensions or use device simulator
Three-panel layout collapses and rearranges appropriately; sidebars can be toggled; UI elements remain accessible and usable

title: Accessibility compliance for keyboard navigation and color contrast
description: Verify all features support keyboard-only navigation and comply with WCAG AA color contrast standards for accessibility.

steps.description: Navigate through application UI elements using keyboard only
All interactive elements are focusable and operable via keyboard
Use color contrast analysis tools on UI components
UI meets WCAG AA color contrast requirements

title: Save operation latency and system uptime
description: Verify average save operation latency is below 100ms and system maintains 99.9% uptime during extended testing periods.

steps.description: Perform multiple document save operations and measure latency
Average latency per save operation is under 100ms
Monitor system operational status over uptime test window
System uptime is at least 99.9%

title: Robust error handling for network failures during document save
description: Check the application handles network disruptions gracefully during save operations with retries and error messages.

steps.description: Simulate network failure during document auto-save or manual save
User is notified of save error and automatic retry logic is triggered
Restore network and verify save completion
Document is saved successfully after reconnection

title: Security: password hashing and HTTPS enforcement
description: Verify passwords are stored using secure hashing and all communications are forced over HTTPS to protect user data.

steps.description: Review backend user password storage implementation
Passwords are stored as secure hashes, not plain text
Attempt to access application over HTTP
HTTP requests are redirected to HTTPS and connection is secure

title: Security: CSRF protection on state-changing requests
description: Ensure the application protects against cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks on forms and API calls changing user or document data.

steps.description: Inspect forms and API requests for presence of CSRF tokens
CSRF tokens are present and validated for all state-changing operations

title: User data scoped access control enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access their own documents, knowledge base items, and profile data and cannot view or modify others' data.

steps.description: Log in as two different users
Attempt to access documents and knowledge base items belonging to another user via URL or API
Access is denied and data is protected
